title: ‘Everything Everywhere All at Once’ Barrels Into Awards Season
description: At a screening filled with Oscar voters, Michelle Yeoh, Ke Huy Quan and the directors marveled at the way their quirky film has struck a chord.
dc:creator: Kyle Buchanan
media:credit: Sinna Nasseri for The New York Times
media:description: The cast and crew at the Los Angeles screening on Tuesday night, including Michelle Yeoh, in yellow, the directors Daniel Scheinert and Daniel Kwan behind and in front of her, and Ke Huy Quan, second from right in the middle row.
